name: Ultra Fight Da ! Kyanta 2
detailed_description:
-About English mode-
For English menus and victory quotes, please press 2 on your keyboard on the boot screen when choosing control method.

-About the game-
Ultra Fight Kyanta 2 is a 2D team fighting game for 1 or 2 players.

-Features-
-Simple controls, including one button specials
-High speed combat
-Many diverse characters
-Online lobbies

-Story-
People all over are being terrorized in strange ways by the mysterious man known as Michelle. What is his plan? The mystery will unfold in due time...

-Controls-
(Note: assumes Xbox 360 buttons)
A: light attack
B: heavy attack (when very close, throws)
X: special attack
Y: ultra attack
A+B: throw (does not cause a heavy attack when out of range)
X+Y: EX special
B+Y: K Cancel
Back: Taunt

Controls, including combination shortcuts, can be remapped at your leisure.

- Java Requirement -
Ultra Fight Da Kyanta2 requires Java Runtime Environment 1.8.0.
You can get Java here : http://www.java.com/getjava

short_description: Ultra Fight Kyanta 2 is a fighting game with a frantic pace and easy to learn controls. You can perform special attacks using single button presses! Fight in 2D battles across various modes using teams of hand-drawn characters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Mínimo:
  • SO: windows10,8,7
  • Procesador: CPU 2.5GHz
  • Memoria: 400 MB de RAM
  • Gráficos: 1280 x 720
  • DirectX: Versión 9.0
  • Almacenamiento: 200 MB de espacio disponible
  • Notas adicionales: Java Runtime Environment 1.8.0 Required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recomendado:
  • SO: windows10,8,7
  • Procesador: CPU 2.5GHz
  • Memoria: 800 MB de RAM
  • Gráficos: 1280 x 720
  • DirectX: Versión 9.0
  • Almacenamiento: 400 MB de espacio disponible
  • Notas adicionales: Java Runtime Environment 1.8.0 Required

movies.name: キャン太2プロモーションムービー
